soc.server

Class UnlocalizedString

  • java.lang.Object
    • soc.server.UnlocalizedString

  • public final class UnlocalizedString
extends java.lang.Object
    Marker for an I18N string to be localized and sent to game members: Key and optional parameters.
    Since:
    2.0.00
    Author:
    Jeremy D Monin <jeremy@nand.net>
    See Also:
    SOCGameHandler.sendGamePendingMessages(soc.game.SOCGame, boolean)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isSpecial
      If true, message contains special JSettlers-specific tokens and should be localized using SOCStringManager.getSpecial(soc.game.SOCGame, String, Object...)
      java.lang.String key
      Message localization key, to retrieve text with StringManager.get(String)
      java.lang.Object[] params
      Optional parameters to use when localizing key's string, or null

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnlocalizedString(boolean isSpecial, java.lang.String k, java.lang.Object... p)
      Create an UnlocalizedString with isSpecial flag and optional parameters.
      UnlocalizedString(java.lang.String k)
      Create an UnlocalizedString with no parameters.
      UnlocalizedString(java.lang.String k, java.lang.Object... p)
      Create an UnlocalizedString with optional parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Contents as string: UnlocalizedString{isSpecial, "keystring", params}

      • key

        public final java.lang.String key
        Message localization key, to retrieve text with StringManager.get(String)

      • params

        public final java.lang.Object[] params
        Optional parameters to use when localizing key's string, or null

      • isSpecial

        public final boolean isSpecial
        If true, message contains special JSettlers-specific tokens and should be localized using SOCStringManager.getSpecial(soc.game.SOCGame, String, Object...)

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnlocalizedString

        public UnlocalizedString(java.lang.String k)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create an UnlocalizedString with no parameters.
        Parameters:
        k - Message localization key, to retrieve text with StringManager.get(String)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if k is null

      • UnlocalizedString

        public UnlocalizedString(java.lang.String k,
                         java.lang.Object... p)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create an UnlocalizedString with optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        k - Message localization key, to retrieve text with StringManager.get(String)
        p - Parameters to use when localizing k's string
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if k is null or p is a 0-length array

      • UnlocalizedString

        public UnlocalizedString(boolean isSpecial,
                         java.lang.String k,
                         java.lang.Object... p)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create an UnlocalizedString with isSpecial flag and optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        k - Message localization key, to retrieve text with StringManager.get(String)
        p - Parameters to use when localizing k's string
        isSpecial - If true, message contains special JSettlers-specific tokens and should be localized using SOCStringManager.getSpecial(soc.game.SOCGame, String, Object...)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if k is null or p is a 0-length array
